title: Cd Packaging, "Talking Heads: (Nothing But) Flowers", 1988
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
Recto: In the top half, centered, there is a bright green wavy edged leaf with a thin stem pointing to the left. Within the leaf, on one line, (Nothing But) is imprinted in upper and lower case letters and on a second line beneath, Flowers is imprinted in somewhat larger capitals. Both lines are curved. In the lower half, Talking Heads is imprinted in large capitals. The background is faux wood grain in orange tones.
Verso: On a chartreuse background, the compact disc title on two lines, followed by production information proceeding to the bottom edge, are imprinted in a zigzag arrangement of the type.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cd Packaging, "Talking Heads: (Nothing But) Flowers", 1988.
1988. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-116.
